title: The Short Spiral: From A Peace Plan Scuttled To A Gaza Invasion
teaser: Until a few weeks ago, Assistant Secretary of State Martin Indyk had been running the faltering U.S. effort to put Israelis and Palestinians on a path toward peace. He speaks with Robert Siegel about the violence in the Gaza Strip and Israel's unfolding ground invasion.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
